title: Ahmed Fahour and Penelope Cruz on Hayman Island for Easter
text: Keen to avoid the mud and the peace pipes, the hog-jowled, striped-tied types headed further north than Byron, to the comfort of Hayman Island's new One & Only luxury resort. Stockbroker to the stars Brent Potts was in residence (no sign of Barbra Streisand), as was his former charge Charlie Aitken, Luminis partner Jamie Garis, Westpac treasurer Curt Zuber, Archer Capital chief executive Peter Wiggs and Australia Post boss Ahmed Fahour – surely having an "AMAZZN" holiday. Hollywood actors Penelope Cruz and Javier Bardem were staying there too. We'd hazard a guess they're dabbling in Australian equities by now. And Fahour must surely be contemplating a new custom number plate: "CRUZIN".
description: Hayman Island was the Easter holiday destination of choice for bankers, brokers and ... Hollywood stars.
